title: The database file is locked (database is locked)
author: hua2hua
txt_content:
貌似是地皮的问题吗
[21:23:30] [警告]: java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_BUSY]  The database file is locked (database is locked)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at org.sqlite.DB.execute(DB.java:339)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.execute(PrepStmt.java:65)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at net.felixkraus.AntiXray.BreakListener$1.run(BreakListener.java:66)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
[21:23:30] [警告]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)复制代码

这个是地皮插件自带的，目前服务器正在进行中，如果把sqlite的use改成false，服务器会炸吗
prefix: ''

# SQLite section
sqlite:
  # Should SQLite be used?
  use: true
  # The file to use
  db: "storage"

# MySQL section
mysql:
  # Should MySQL be used?
  use: false
  host: "localhost"
  port: "3306"
  user: "root"
  password: "password"
  database: "plot_db"
  # Set additional properties: https://goo.gl/wngtN8
  properties: 
  - "useSSL=false"
复制代码

也或许不是地皮的问题，LWC也是使用sqlite，还关不了，也加载不了。。每次加载都会卡住一下

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
你的数据库被锁上了...
建议你
sqlite:
  # Should SQLite be used?
  use: true
  # The file to use
  db: "storage"
备份一下然后吧use改为false

replies.author: 星耀幻影
replies.txt_content: 关闭sqlite即可，如必须开启，请忽视本条回复
